name.th: ภูเขาเหล็ก

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Drive tanks, defeat enemies, and unlock upgrades in Hills of Steel. Try it now!
short.ca: Conduisez des tanks, vainquez des ennemis et débloquez des améliorations dans Hills of Steel. Essayez-le maintenant !
short.de: Fahren Sie Panzer, besiegen Sie Feinde und schalten Sie Upgrades in Hills of Steel frei. Probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.et,fr,he,id: Conduce tanques, derrota enemigos y desbloquea mejoras en Hills of Steel. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.fil: Conduisez des chars, combattez les ennemis et débloquez des améliorations dans Hills of Steel. Essayez-le maintenant!
short.hi: Conduisez des chars, vainquez des ennemis et débloquez des améliorations dans Hills of Steel. Essayez-le maintenant !
short.hu: Vezess tankokat, győzd le az ellenségeket, és szerezz fejlesztéseket a Hills of Steel játékban. Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Conduce tanques, derrota a enemigos y desbloquea mejoras en Hills of Steel. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.lv: Brauc ar tankiem, uzvarē ienaidniekus un atbloķē jauninājumus spēlē "Hills of Steel". Izmēģini tagad!
short.ms,uk: Conduisez des chars, battez des ennemis et débloquez des améliorations dans Hills of Steel. Essayez-le maintenant !
short.no: ¡Conduce tanques, derrota enemigos y desbloquea mejoras en Hills of Steel. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Napędzaj czołgi, pokonuj wrogów i odblokowuj ulepszenia w grze Hills of Steel. Wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Condu tancuri, învinge duşmanii şi deblochează upgrade-uri în Hills of Steel. Încearcă acum!
short.sl: Poganjajte tanke, premagajte sovražnike in odklepajte nadgradnje v igri Hills of Steel. Poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Возите тенкове, победите непријатеље и откључајте надоградње у игри Hills of Steel. Испробајте сада!
short.th: ขับทั้งรถถัง ตีศัตรู และปลดล็อคอัปเกรดในเกม Hills of Steel ลองเล่นเลย!
short.tr: Sürücü tankları, düşmanları yen ve Hills of Steel'de yükseltmeleri kilitle. Şimdi deneyin!
short.vi: Lái xe tăng, đánh bại kẻ thù và mở khóa nâng cấp trong Hills of Steel. Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 驾驶坦克，击败敌人，并解锁升级，在《钢铁之丘》中尝试吧！
short.zh_TW: 駕駛坦克，打敗敵人，解鎖升級，在《鋼鐵之丘》中嘗試一下吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Hills of Steel is an action-packed shooter game that puts you in control of a tank! Race and blast your way through hilly battlefields filled with enemies. Unlock and deploy a variety of tanks, mechs, and robots in your quest for dominance! Enhance your tank's power with Boosters like mines, force shields, and rocket strikes. Can you build the ultimate tank and conquer the Hills of Steel? 🛡️💥

🎮 How to play Hills of Steel:

Move: Use the A and D keys or the Arrow keys to drive your tank!
Shoot: Press the spacebar to shoot!
Repair: Hit the B button to repair your tank!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
